website_summaries.verdict: Gets the job done in small spaces and blends in with attire.
pros: We love the sound coverage, which reaches up to 10,000 feet
Clean, crisp sound with no distortion
Comes with a comfortable headset and waistband for convenient use
cons: The cords may get in the way of vigorous movements

customer_reviews.title: Saves my voice!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled with this. As a teacher, I use my voice all day, every day. It can be quite taxing, but since using this, I can remain mobile and everyone can still hear me without havingto strain or raise my voice. Apparently, it does alter or tinnify (if that's a word) your voice a bit, but the built in speaker is definitely loud enough for the entire classd top hear me and the rechargeable battery lasts for weeks. A couple other teachers bought these as well after seeing and using mine. A very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: weezerang

customer_reviews.title: A gift from God!
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a blessing. We use it to read the Bible to a group of people and it's been great. You can speak very softly and the sound carries well. It is used mainly outdoors and even with things like wind or surrounding noise it still sounds very nice. Thank you Jesus! :) So then faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of God. Jesus answered, “I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me." Romans 10:17, John 14:6
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: This amplifier has saved my voice!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher, and I sometimes have up to 31 high schoolers in one tight space. After lunch, when they get rowdy, I find myself repeating myself, yelling to talk over them, and otherwise straining my voice. This gets their attention immediately, and I waste less effort in the process. I get fewer sore throats throughout the school year, and I feel less drained at the end of the day. I get to speak in a soft “indoor” voice, but everyone in the class can hear me as though I were standing right next to them. Other teachers regularly ask me where I got this mic, and how they can get one!
customer_reviews.author: miriam c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Parkinson's patients
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend's grandfather, who has been having a hard time communicating since he was diagnosed with Parkinson's. This device makes it easier for all of us to hear his jokes and stories, it also helps the nurse to hear him clearly when she comes to check in on him. It's simple enough for him and his wife to operate. Cannot recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: As an elementary music teacher, I am always talking or singing, and that can take a toll on my vocal cords. With this device, I can control my voice level and keep my vocal cords healthy. I use this in chorus and band rehearsals and have not dealt with vocal strain since I've started using it a few weeks ago. Excellent device for a teacher!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has absolutely saved my voice while teaching. Especially at the beginning of a school year, I can lose or strain my voice after teaching all day. The speaker must stay on or near you and the headset, but that doesn't really bug me. It keeps a long charge and is easy to plug in to charge.
customer_reviews.author: JonnaMomma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after suffering paralysis of one of my vocal chords- leaving me with a breathy, weak voice. Used it in restaurants, car rides, video chats and noisy places to help amplify my voice. It’s not perfect. Sometimes it cuts in and out and you have to be careful of getting the microphone to close to the speaker or it causes feedback. But it works very well for the price and was very helpful in allowing me to communicate better. Wish I had stumbled across it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGGG!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mic is a tad bit sensitive so play around with it until it stops having the loud feedback sound it gets when the speaker and mic are too close, until you figure out the right distance to have it in so it doesn't make that awful sound... Once you figure that out it works SO WELL!!! and it's very loud!! I am so excited... SO EXCITED that I won't loose my voice anymore because of my mask 🤩🤩 The sound is fairly crisp, keep the mic antad bit away from your mouth beecause it picks up on EVERYTHING!! So any breath, cough, runny nose sounds you do it will pick it up 🤣. I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Nanita Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money and buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money by buying this product, first of all it has a really bad quality sound, and the sound volume is so low, I think if you use it with in a group of 5 people no one will hear you speaking and if they accidentally hear they won’t understand because of it’s bad quality sound! I forgot to mention that the battery life dies so fast and you won’t be able to use it for a long time (one hour and a half approximately)
customer_reviews.author: nour zakor

customer_reviews.title: ... acoustic or electric ukelele - does the trick really nicely and seems to last a long time - I ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the coolest little voice amplifier - I bought it so I can sing when I'm playing my acoustic or electric ukelele - does the trick really nicely and seems to last a long time - I love that I can take it anywhere and have an instant jam session with friends - totally recommend - lots of fun for an inexpensive microphone - you can pay way over hundreds of dollars for a professional head microphone but then you would have to have an amplifier etc to hook up - this makes it simple and easy -
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but Need to Figure Out How to Clean Between Uses
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly happy with this unit. I bought two of them for use on tours by different people. As such, I really need to clean/sanitize them between uses. I don't think that the foam mike protector comes off, so I will have to carefully clean it in place. I might try spraying Lysol on the foam. Otherwise, the unit works great, and is clear and relatively loud. The biggest problem is getting the tour guide to orient the mike properly and turn the volume up. I will have to coach a bit more next time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Polson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I work a booth at the state fair selling products. Apparently my voice is not load enough to overcome all the the commotion at the fair so people were straining to hear me. This was the answer. It is clear, the headband is easy to wear and there is no feedback noise. It has worked so well that I have now ordered it for others and even more vendors keep coming up to know where to buy one. If I had thought of it sooner, I would sell them myself because they seem to be what everyone needs. I've ordered two so far one for me and one for another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Throat-saving
customer_reviews.text: So I was seriously thinking of quitting teaching and finding some other job that doesn't require speaking, for I nearly lost my voice due to having to speak at the top of my lungs daily for 6 hours straight. Then I found this. I purchased it just some days ago and used it for two days, and it's just amazing! I could speak without shouting and hurting my throat and my students heard me more clearly. I'd recommend this to any person straining their vocal chords continuously.
customer_reviews.author: OKG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher with a paralyzed vocal cord. This voice amplifier was a job saver!! Works great, I wear it around my neck with the "Madonna" headset on my head (I have a big head and this is comfortable) the mouthpiece moves easily. Seriously, I could not be employed without this device. Great for any education facility to have around in case a teacher gets laryngitis. Or if you just want your voice to carry. There is no weird delay--amplifies your live voice.
customer_reviews.author: colorado mom

customer_reviews.title: At full charge, runs well for only 40 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it on a daily basis for about one month, but so far i am happy with the clear sound quality. My only complaint is that it doesn’t hold a charge for very long- about 40 minutes- and then the amplification starts progressively weakening! Product description is definitely exaggerated. So I have to charge in between uses throughout the day. The other thing that is a little inconvenient is that the charging cord is usb on one end and the old mini b on the other end. This is inconvenient because most devices have micro USB ports, so I have to have bother with multiple charging cords.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblemommy

customer_reviews.title: Classroom voice amplifier
customer_reviews.text: Very happy after 5 weeks of use to help me amplify my voice in my middle school classroom. It is really nice not to have to strain my voice. My favorite feature is that it recharges by just plugging it in each night. The headphone is fine, but i have to take off my earring. I would prefer a clip on or around the nick mic. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Toborg

customer_reviews.title: Listen to bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to believe the good reviews, but this product doesn't work. Screeching feedback is NOT something I want to subject my students or myself to. I tried the headset that came with it and a third-party lavilier mic. The instructions say to keep the mic 24 inches from the speaker--it's more like 40 inches from the speaker--even then the sound is poor. I'd need to wear it around my ankles. Do not buy. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I saw many positive comments and bought it. But it is a waste of money. This thing makes a static noise all the time. I wont be using it in front of people. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Abu habib

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for one day in a large room with about 100 people. There was a lot of feedback and static. It wS not loud at all. I never used it again. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: crixcross

customer_reviews.title: Great voice enhancer
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and tried it once, worked great. A little confusing when they said to fully charge before use and it came fully charged. I only intend to use it as a voice amplifier so I did not check out the other features. The controls are close together on the top of the device, but ok for me as I only plan to use the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: catlover2027

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the money but be careful of feedback.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is a kindergarten teacher. She saw another teacher using one and thought it would help save her from raising her voice. It seems to be a quality made unit. It has a bit of heft to it. It doesn't feel like lightweight junk. The sound is good but when you turn it up to the louder volumes you have to be careful of feedback. She had to hold the unit pointed away from her instead of wearing it with the shoulder strap at the higher volume levels. All in all a good value for the money. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of feedback
customer_reviews.text: I wore this product clipped to my waist (as it’s designed to be worn), and there was unavoidable feedback from the mic (on my head/at my mouth, as it’s designed to be worn). I tried adjusting the mic position, the volume, the speaker position, etc, and could find no way to eliminate the loud and startling feedback.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & powerful
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with my purchase. The product is exactly as described. Very lightweight. Tested it out with music playing loudly and my voice was able to be heard clearly. This product will be perfect at the paint party's I teach.
customer_reviews.author: Airreanna

customer_reviews.title: only good if they're listening
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it because I have a weak voice and teach in a camp that has year-round environmental ed where I lead large groups daily. This amplifier works when the groups are listening, but it doesn't work to get the attention of noisy groups. I can use it in some situations but will have to keep looking for a solution for the noisy times.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Henson

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my uncle that is an interventional cardiologist in Jersey. His patients cannot hear him through his mask & face shield so he asked for a microphone/speaker so his patient's could hear him. I tried it out myself before delivering it to him and it really is amazing. The sound quality is clear, no static. Read the directions because you will get interference if you point the microphone a certain way towards the speaker. It comes with a strap so you can strap it around your waste and not notice it on your body (it's very light). Thank you for giving us this opportunity to help those in need during this pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Karkos

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. As a 1st grade teacher I’m almost always over extending my voice in a classroom full of students all day long. I naturally have a soft voice and sometimes talking all day long takes a toll on my voice and throat. With this little device I can simply just talk in a normal volume and time and the little speaker amplifies my voice so my students can hear me loud and clear. I can adjust the volume on the speaker as needed and the battery life is great. I charge it about every 3 days. Very happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Heatherrr

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our WSU Master Gardener group offers frequent workshops and presentations to ever larger groups. Our gathering room is about 100' x 40', and this little gizmo projects sound to the very back of the room. Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Imwildflower

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality sub par
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is comparable to a fast food loud speaker (what did you expect for the money?) which I can deal with; however getting the volume at or near full without feedback or squeaking is a challenge I never succeeded at. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Schniers Family

customer_reviews.title: does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: sound is horrible.. works for 2 min and than blows away scream like sounds.. not a right connection .. wrong item for presentations.. since will interfere with your speech.. bad producrt
customer_reviews.author: t.m.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No matter where I put the microphone if I want my voice to be heard, I get feedback and howling horribly, even when I put the speaker on my back. I most likely won't be able to use it, but I'm too lazy to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Prime

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the way this product actually does amplify my voice. My vocal cords were severely damaged as the result of having to be on a ventilator for an extended period of time. This gadget will allow my husband to hear me as I give him road directions when we hit the road again. He's the RV driver. The GPS and I are the navigators.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Good for teachers
customer_reviews.text: This is a loud amplifier. When you turn volume up and put the speaker towards the mic it create a very annoying feedback/echo but that’s expected. I put speaker on the slight back left side kind of opposite side of the mic direction then it works without echo or feedback.
customer_reviews.author: A. Doyuran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teaching w a mask on!
customer_reviews.text: I am grateful for this tool! Wearing a mask all day w my students, this speaker has helped us so much. I don’t have to strain my voice for the students to hear me and they can hear me clearly without much effort. I wish the volume was buttons rather than a wheel that powers the whole thing, so that it would stay at a set volume, but overall it’s still well-used and much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am a music teacher who has to teach outside during covid. This works great for me and it was cheap. I charge it, then strap the speaker around my waist, and plug in the headset. It's comfortable and the sound is good. I sing into it and there is little distortion. It was recommended to me by other music teachers and I am so glad I got it. I am surprised how well it works for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Dini

customer_reviews.title: If you try to hear someone with a medical mask without removing it, this might work
customer_reviews.text: The best for the price. I used it for a relative who use a mechanical respirator mask. We couldn't hear her when she speak because of the mask, so this device solve the problem. The microphone did not interfered with the seal of the mask mask so, yeah, it was a good solution. I would suggest removing the windshield from the microphone to avoid bacterial issues inside the mask (if that's the use your planning). In the open, maybe you should keep a distance of 3 ft. to avoid microphone-speaker feedback before the 50% of volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Kanon8406

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very easy to use. I purchased this for my preacher when he taught bible study to the 80 years and up glass. Everyone hears him fine but does not disturb other classrooms. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Harper

customer_reviews.title: Distorted sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in a woodshop for classes so I could be heard with a mask on in the COVID era The first time I tried it everyone laughed at the poor sound quality. It’s on my shelf if you want it
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I am a teacher and I have used this everyday for the past year or so. I find it so helpful, as I can speak in a very quiet voice and the students can hear me clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a week! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the connection between the microphone and the speaker started breaking after only a few days of using this product. I had to hold the cord to get the speaker and microphone to connect, which was inconvenient as I was using this in my classroom. I missed the return window, or I would have returned this. I am disappointed in myself for not returning a product that only worked for a week, and I am disappointed in Amazon for having a 30-day return policy. Save yourself some trouble and DO NOT order this device.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E Holder

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect, we have used it for groups of upto ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is simple, it works perfectly, ! I work in a Botanical Garden and we often give tours. This is perfect, we have used it for groups of upto 40 people in the outside, and they all listen super good. It helps to keep the groups attached. The materials feel of good quality, they are even a bit shiny ! I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Save your voice!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of public speaking, teaching and giving classroom presentations, and needed something simple and inexpensive that allows me to move around the room and be heard clearly. This is a great solution, is loud enough for a large classroom or lecture hall, and is well-made. It charges reasonably quickly; I’m not sure how long the battery lasts, because I charge it every time I use it, and I’ve not used it for an entire day yet, but so far, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for weak voice
customer_reviews.text: Due to medical problems, I have a pretty unreliable voice (spoke for a living for 40 plus years). Just got this but I am amazed. I am able to speak reliably if I keep my volume and tone low, and this really does the trick on allowing me to be heard. Irritates my wife when I use it, but tough, I'm tired of not being heard, being cut off when I try to speak and can't. Treatments are not yet working, but this gadget is. Unique use, will try the mp3 player on my collection of old music. I'd love to find a less conspicuous mini boom mic. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lecoq

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the chance to use this for a few times before having some changes made. It works very well, it's very light and not bulky. The sound quality is excellent. It does give a high pitch sound sometimes I couldn't figure out what was causing the frequency range to go high pitched but other than that it's very good and makes it easy to teach in a loud environment and to communicate with others in general.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Static and loud screech noice when on, did not use.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Scholes

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I am a Culinary teacher and I use this when my students are in the kitchen cooking so they can hear me. They think I sound like a carnival worker, but they can hear me. The sound is clear and I Love I can run it up loud. Very happy with my speaker headset!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: I can sing my heart out like it's nobody business. 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love because I love to sing and my voice is the best, besides it helps build up my lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Grant

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Title !!!
customer_reviews.text: This voice amplifier should be touted by Amazon as a fantastic AAC device. After experimenting with all types of AAC devices ranging in price from $24 TO $6,000, this works the best fro me. I have ataxic dysarthria (a vocal disorder from neurological impairment) is spasticity of the vocal chords resulting in drunken-sounding or slurred speech. However, this portable voice amplifier , without complex setup instructions, corrects the vocal disorder. I have a typical voice again !!! Kudos to the manufacturer and to Amazon for this portable voice amplifier !!! ;) I Remain... Patrick O'Neill, Ph.D.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Neill, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for one of our stage plays. The product worked perfectly. I love the fact that it is rechargeable and can be worn with a strap or clipped to your clothing. The headset was adjustable and the mouthpiece picked up our voices perfectly. The sound was very clear and our audience was able to hear every word. This is great for those on a limited budget. It will serve the purpose to give volume to your actors/actresses and it is very easy to use. This is also great for recording and has an usb input. You can control the mic volume. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: renay30

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: I like that the battery stays charged for a long time and it works well to amplify my voice. I don't like the headset - it slips around a lot and it seems like the microphone is so heavy it pulls the dinky headband down. I also don't like that it clicks as I walk - pretty annoying when you're a tour guide. Overall , it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Total Karen

customer_reviews.title: All 2020 teachers need
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing! Teaching with a mask on muffles my voice. This is a great way to project my voice! Super loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and this product is AMAZING!!!! Due to COVID, the students are 6 feet apart and some are at home distance learning via Zoom. With this voice amplifier, all of the kids can hear my voice VERY clearly. I don't have to yell through my mask. This has saved my voice this year!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey A. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Screeching Feedback
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, FEEDBACK. There’s this horrible, nails-on-blackboard, screeching squeal that comes without warning. My ears have begun bleeding. All the rabbits, squirrels, and dogs in the neighborhood just stopped what they were doing and ran as fast away as they could when they heard the terrifying banshee wail from this thing. This includes my own dog, so I now need to go find him. Too bad I don’t have a working voice amplifier to call for him.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name Private-APC

customer_reviews.title: Use in the classroom while wearing a mask
customer_reviews.text: So far so so! Got this to use in the classroom while wearing a mask. I tried to place the mix both inside and outside of my mask. Have chosen wear outside.m of my mask. It does get loud, and you can control the volume. The volume control also allows one to turn it off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: I can teach through Covid
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this thing. As a teacher in the age of masks and Covid-19 prevention, I needed something to give my low voice a boost. This works so well! I used to go hope with a sore, strained throat. Not anymore. It also features a USB-c charger, so batteries are never an issue. I've also never had a charge die on me during a school day, and usually use it for 2 days back-to-back with charging. Awesome item!
customer_reviews.author: NoahDavid Lein

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I got some of these for my haunted attraction for both splitting up individual sound effects in various places and / or for actors to use under full head masks so they could be heard clearly. I love that you can use a thumb drive for a particular sound and that it automatically loops. The sound is quite loud yet remains clear. Of course, don't expect much bass from this, but I'll be getting more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little amp
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little amp with a loud and crisp sound and comfortable headset. The battery life was awesome and I ran it for over 8 hours and still had life left. I Purchased this for use with a Scout Trooper cosplay and blew a lot of peoples minds when they realized I could talk. Though there are no special effects, many people said I sounded just like the Scout Troopers from Return of the Jedi, so if you're looking for a mic for a star wars armor kit, this will more than get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Liked the portability and size. Be aware of creating feedback under certain circumstances. We had another PA system and it hit some interference which was fixable. We just had to make adjustments with making sure things are spread apart enough which is not unusual. Or if turned up volume too high. Highly recommend still!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an onboard train attendant in one of the deluxe cars for the Cumbres & Toltec scenic railroad. With the sound of the train, people talking added with my soft voice it has been extremely hard for people to hear me. This little amazing piece of equipment has made all the difference in the world!!! The sound is so good that it sounds like there is a speaker system in the train car! I highly recommend this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PINK

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Was okay for 5 months then the dial broke so I cant turn it on or off. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ballman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Teacher here. I've been using this now for about a month. It's so loud I can use it during recess and the kids can hear me across the playground. It's also been great for use in the cafeteria where it can get super noisy. It has been fantastic for classroom use and I love that it is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cain

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is trash, controls are facing opposite you when using the device on your body. Doesn’t work with USB and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Denverdude

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought it would be. Also has interference noise often. Only had it for a few hours and thinking about returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrita B

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since the beginning of the school year. It worked right out of the box. The battery has amazing longevity. I do wish it showed how much battery was left, but I have used it for several days in a row before I have needed to recharge it. I am an elementary music teacher and this has been such a great help in saving my voice as I sing all day. The sound quality is very good. I even used it at a grave side service that I was asked to sing at and it worked very well. I highly recommend this for the price and the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and excellent voice quality
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly when speaking to a group of 50 women. It has solved out problem of not being able to hear many speakers beyond the first row. The voice quality is clear and now anyone of our people can speak and be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our pastor based on the reviews and I'm honestly disappointed. Our church is quite small so we didn't necessarily need something loud but we can barely hear him. If he turns up the volume passed 50%, it makes a loud squeaking sound that's very unpleasant. Still not sure how to get around that or why it happens. Considering returning the item altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Parkwood Bible Church

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this to talk to my mother who is very hard of hearing, so I use it in small rooms only. It works great and she can hear me very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use amplification
customer_reviews.text: I give tours at an historic site and with the new restrictions, I have to keep people spread out a bit. However, they usually can’t hear me if they’re really spread out, so I got this to make it easier on all of us. The sound quality is excellent (make sure you keep it away from the mic to avoid feedback) and I don’t have to scream at our visitors to be heard.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I purchased to assist my teaching during the pandemic!
